seniority_level.evidence: Job requires a minimum of 3 years experience and does not use senior titles.

job_family.evidence: Title is "Data Engineer-Business Intelligence" and responsibilities focus on ETL, reporting and data warehousing.

sub_specialty.evidence: Role emphasizes BI/DW projects, reporting, and Cognos visualization, typical of data‑warehouse work.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management or team‑lead responsibilities; only technical contribution is described.

primary_cloud.evidence: Must‑have skills list includes AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure, indicating experience across multiple clouds.

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three clouds are listed as required; no single cloud is singled out as secondary.

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica) are typically used for batch pipelines; no streaming technologies are mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Job description does not reference Airflow, Luigi, dbt, or any orchestration platform.

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on BI/DW reporting and Cognos suggests a data‑warehouse storage layer.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is Pune, Maharashtra, India and work model is onsite; no remote option is described.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, which falls in the APAC region; no explicit timezone requirement is stated.

relocation_required.evidence: Position is onsite in Pune with no mention of relocation assistance or requirement.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned for an India‑based role; default assumption is no sponsorship.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; role is for experienced professionals in India.

citizenship_required.evidence: The posting does not specify citizenship or work‑authorization requirements.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full‑time permanent, which corresponds to a regular employee (W2) arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits such as health, PTO, equity, or learning budget are listed in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The description does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No reference to mentorship programs or working with senior mentors.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: The posting contains no language about promotions or advancement paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves within the company.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must‑have hard and soft skills plus a minimum of 3 years experience; nice‑to‑have list is short.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on a single role: Data Engineer for BI/DW reporting.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skills and experience level align with a mid‑level data engineer; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations are present.
